extendedInfo.description: A tool to change the color of your trackball or notification LED when standby mode (screen off).Tested on Nexus One with Android 2.2 FroyoPlease enable pulse notification light setting when running this app:Setting->Sound->Pulse notification lightPlease visit: www.propagation-systems.com/apps.htm

reviews.title: P/T
reviews.comment: It only works for the first few mins then the bar icon goes away and so does the assigned color.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be very nice if it worked on my Motorola Droid. Normal colors that are some what bright are the only colors that work. Fix if you can please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: LAUGHING AT STUPID PEOPLE SAYING SAYING IT DOESN\'T WORK FOR THERE DROID AND EVO IDIOTS ITS FOR NEXUS 1 WHICH HAS A TRACK BALL ....CAN PEOPLE READ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice to see colours but would be good if it replaced the white light when alert
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: People are stupid. This app only works on the nexus one. This app is beast XD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does nothing but make my normal light keep flashing. stupid app UNINSTALL!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Changes LED color 4 all events. Why so f\'ing hard 2 get different colors 4 different events?? Not all colors in map accurate, N1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: works fine with supported colors. would be better if it didnt show in the notification bar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could not get it to work on HTC wildfire. I have tried several apps and it appears that it is not possible to customize the LED colour on a wildfire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: I don\'t have a power button so I tried to see if I could use this app to turn on phone since my thinking was it would require power to change the trackball color. Never did a thing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow how retarded are people it dosent work for phones that dont have a trackball lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice app and i was locking for it,but the app keep stopping after a few minutes im using n1 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dosent work on my G2....it didnt show up in my settings or change th color of th light....wish it did work tho thn it would b sweet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Simple app works well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nexus 1/2.2 doesn\'t work. You can test the color, but it doesn\'t apply to the other notifications. Color picker is hard to use, colors not accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: About he fifth led flasher i have downloaded, once again, let down by it. All smart phones should have changing led colours because alot dont have it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked perfectly until my phone was updated to Gingerbread... Please fix! Nexus One
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works kinda, only color I have is green tho & choosing color could be made easier, HTC desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Displays the color once that\'s all. Pretty much has no other use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not work on my hd2...maybe bcuz I shouldn\'t have android on it since its a windows phone. Lls...sorry.
